docs.lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration has approved a new medicine to fight complex infections in the abdomen and urinary tract, the fourth antibiotic the agency has approved since May.

headline.main: FDA OKs Cubist Antibiotic for Serious Infections
headline.print_headline: FDA OKs Cubist Antibiotic for Serious Infections

docs.snippet: The Food and Drug Administration has approved a new medicine to fight complex infections in the abdomen and urinary tract, the fourth antibiotic the agency has approved since May.

docs.lead_paragraph: One million people have been wounded during Syria's civil war and diseases are spreading as regular supplies of medicine fail to reach patients, the World Health Organization's Syria representative said.

headline.main: One Million People Wounded, Diseases Spreading in Syria: WHO
headline.print_headline: One Million People Wounded, Diseases Spreading in Syria: WHO

docs.snippet: One million people have been wounded during Syria's civil war and diseases are spreading as regular supplies of medicine fail to reach patients, the World Health Organization's Syria representative said.

docs.lead_paragraph: Economic isolation has left Cuba poor, but people there live as long as their counterparts in richer countries.

headline.main: Can Cuba Escape Poverty but Stay Healthy?

docs.snippet: Economic isolation has left Cuba poor, but people there live as long as their counterparts in richer countries.
